class.name: TrainDoor
class.brief_description: This class is eligible for managing door behavior as well as their low-circuit voltage, platforms, opening, closing and controlling
class.description: This class simply coordinates door behavior

members.member: Enables auto closing doors after a certain period of time
Automatic closing of centrally open doors after a certain period of time.
The speed at which the automatic door closing occurs, set by default to -1, which means no automatic closing.
When the door closing button is pressed, a buzz sound is activated automatically, and when released, the doors close.
Is there a door lock
Door closing delay, in seconds.

Determines method of closing doors. The following values are valid: Passenger - default type when no definition is provided; doors are manually closed, ignoring any remote commands AutomaticCtrl - doors operate automatically DriverCtrl - doors are controlled by the driver of the train and only respond to remote commands Conductor - doors are controlled by the conductor of the train and only respond to remote commands Mixed - doors can be closed both manually and remotely
Animation speed for closing doors
Only a buzzer (used before closing the doors, like in EN57 EMUs)
Width (or angle) of full door opening
Bounce distance for Plug-type doors (sliding bounce), in meters.
Rotation angle for a fully unfolded mirror
Vehicle speed at which automatic closure of exterior mirrors occurs
Opening the doors by passengers requires permission from the train driver.
Door opening delay, in seconds.

Determines method of opening doors. The following values are valid: Passenger - default type when no definition is provided; doors are manually closed, ignoring any remote commands AutomaticCtrl - doors operate automatically DriverCtrl - doors are controlled by the driver of the train and only respond to remote commands Conductor - doors are controlled by the conductor of the train and only respond to remote commands Mixed - doors can be closed both manually and remotely
Animation speed for opening doors
Opening the train doors by holding down the momentary open permission button for specified number of seconds.
By default, the position of the knob is set from the permit/list entry where the positions are numbered starting from 1.

Flashing of the permission to open the door indicator: 0 - continuous light 1 - continuous light when any door is open or any step is extended; flashing only when permission is granted 2 - continuous light when any door is open; flashing when permission is granted; the position of the step is irrelevant 3 - flashing regardless of the state of the doors or the position of the step

Door programmer configuration. Number in the range 0-3 where 0=no permissions, 1=permission for left doors, 2=permission for right doors, 3=permission for all doors.
e.g. 1|0|3
Shift value in meters or rotation angle for a fully deployed platform
Maximum speed of opening the platform
Type of animation of the platform
The speed of the animation platform, where 1.0 corresponds to an animation lasting one second, the value 0.5 corresponds to two seconds, etc.
Voltage of low-voltage circuit required to control doors: 0 = 0V / mechanical opening 12 = 12V 110 = 110V
